heroSubtitle: Empower your team with AI that handles routine calls and scheduling, freeing your staff to focus on patient care and growing your practice.
trustedBy: Trusted by Leading Clinics in Quebec
featuresTitle: AI That Amplifies Your Team's Impact
featuresSubtitle: Automate routine tasks so your staff can focus on what matters most—exceptional patient care
featureStaffTimeDesc: Your team saves 15+ hours per week by letting AI handle routine calls and scheduling.
featureRevenueDesc: Capture more appointments while your staff focuses on high-value patient interactions.
featureCallVolumeDesc: AI handles 80% of routine calls, freeing staff for complex patient needs.
featureProductivityDesc: Staff productivity increases by 3x when AI handles scheduling and follow-ups.
featureInsuranceDesc: Verify coverage automatically during calls, eliminating manual lookups for staff.
featureCapacityDesc: Handle 2x more patient inquiries without adding staff members.
howItWorksSubtitle: Setting up Parlae AI is simple and straightforward. No technical expertise required.
stepConnectDesc: Link Parlae AI to your practice management system in just a few clicks. Our setup wizard makes it easy.
stepCustomizeDesc: Train your AI agent with your practice information, services, and booking preferences.
stepForwardDesc: Forward your practice line to Parlae AI. We handle the calls while you focus on patients.
stepWatchDesc: Monitor calls, review transcripts, and see appointments automatically added to your calendar.
averageSetupTime: Average time from signup to first call handled
integrationsSubtitle: Parlae AI works seamlessly with your current practice management software
customIntegrationDesc: We offer custom integrations and have a robust API for any practice management system.
testimonialsSubtitle: See what clinic owners and dentists are saying about Parlae AI
testimonial1Quote: Parlae AI has transformed our practice. We're booking 40% more appointments and our patients love the instant response times.
testimonial2Quote: The best investment we've made. Our staff can focus on patient care instead of answering phones all day.
testimonial3Quote: We were skeptical at first, but Parlae AI sounds so natural that patients don't even realize they're talking to AI.
